title: A Night to Surrender
author: Tessa Dare
description: Dare's first trilogy for Avon features the ladies of Spinster—ahem, Spindle—Cove, and the men determined to win their love.

title: If You Hear Her
author: Shiloh Walker
description: launches a romantic suspense trilogy as Walker's first Ballantine title.

title: In Bed with a Highlander
author: Maya Banks
description: Banks's sexy Scottish historical is the first in a back-to-back mass market original trilogy.

title: King's Pleasure
author: Adrianne Byrd
description: The sexy King brothers own a successful bachelor party–planning business and a string of upscale clubs across the country. What could be better than living the single life in some of the world's most glamorous cities? Finding a woman worth giving it all up for.

title: Legacy of Love
author: Donna Hill
description: On their 30th birthdays, the Beaumont women are said to come into a mysterious "sixth sense." And if they choose to give themselves fully to the wrong man, they lose everything.

title: Bride of the Night
author: Heather Graham
description: She's the vampire that could destroy a nation. At least, that's what Pinkerton detective Finn Dunne thinks when he captures Tara Fox aboard a ship sneaking its way northward.

title: In Seconds
author: Brenda Novak
description: Laurel Hodges has been on the run for the past four years, trying to outdistance the gang members who blame her for the death of one of their own. She finds peace in a small town, but how long can it last?

title: The Greatest Love on Earth
author: Mary Ellen Dennis
description: The exotic world of a 19th-century circus features death-defying feats, dangerous rivalries, and a transcendent romance.

title: The Highlander's Heart
author: Amanda Forester
description: Fleeing into the wilderness to escape an abusive marriage, Lady Isabelle Tynsdale would sooner face down a wild boar than spend another night with her wretched husband.

title: Unleashed
author: Sara Humphreys
publisher: Lord and Lady Spy by Shana Galen (Sept., $6.99, ISBN 978-1-4022-5907-4). Galen parodies Mr. and Mrs. Smith with a rollicking tale of two of England's top spies who hide their secret identities even from each other.
description: This debut, originally self-published, is an unusual take on shape-shifters.

title: No Proper Lady
author: Isabel Cooper
description: England, 1888: the trees are green, the birds are singing, and in 200 years demons will destroy it all, unless Joan, a rough-around-the-edges assassin from the future, can take out the dark magician responsible. But to get close to her target, she'll need help learning how to fit into society.

title: Scrumptious
author: Amanda Usen
description: Sparks fly between love 'em and leave 'em pastry chef and poker sharp Marlene Bennet and traveling chef-for-hire Joe Rafferty when the two culinary perfectionists are forced to share a kitchen.

title: Lady Sophie's Christmas Wish
author: Grace Burrowes
description: It's just before Christmas, and Lady Sophie Windham has an abandoned baby on her hands with nobody to help her except a handsome stranger who hates the holidays.

title: Heartwishes: An Edilean Novel
author: Jude Deveraux
description: While cataloguing the documents of the Frazier family, Gemma Ranford finds references to the Heartwishes Stone, said to grant wishes to anyone named Frazier.

title: A Secret in Her Kiss
author: Anna Randol
description: Randol’s masterful debut visits 1815 Constantinople, where a soldier finds love with a spirited spy.

title: Scandal Wears Satin
author: Loretta Chase
description: Chase follows the superlative Silk Is for Seduction with another tale of aristocrats turned seamstresses who find passion and love as sumptuous as the gowns they create.

title: Texas Bride: A Bitter Creek Novel
author: Joan Johnston
description: Johnson’s satisfying late 19th-century western takes a look at the difficult life of a young woman who becomes a mail-order bride to save her siblings from a terrible orphanage.

title: Into the Dreaming
author: Karen Marie Moning
description: Fans of Moning’s Fever and Highlander series will be thrilled by this hardcover reissue of her early novella, a paranormal time-travel romance set in the Scottish Highlands.

title: The Darkest Seduction
author: Gena Showalter
description: Bestseller Showalter unveils the story of Paris, the darkest and most tormented Lord of the Underworld, in her latest Underworld paranormal.

title: Diamond Dreams
author: Zuri Day
description: Day’s latest Atlanta-set African-American contemporary will please fans with the pairing of a blue-eyed frat boy and a doctor tired of Mr. Wrongs.

title: Sweet Addiction
author: Maya Banks
description: Banks pens a smoking erotic romance with unabashed s&m elements that will leave readers breathless.

title: Dire Needs: A Novel of the Eternal Wolf Clan
author: Stephanie Tyler
description: Romantic suspense author Tyler moves into paranormal territory with a complex romance involving rogues, witches, black magic, and weretrappers.

title: Caught in the Act
author: Jill Sorenson
description: Sorenson develops an unusual romance between a border protection officer and a woman who’s blackmailed into smuggling packages for a drug lord.

title: Bear Meets Girl
author: Shelly Laurenston
description: Outrageous humor, sexy shape-shifters, and an irresistible hero are the highlights of this fast-paced novel.

title: Matthew
author: Emma Lang
description: Lang introduces the eight Graham siblings in this sweet, engaging historical western, which has plenty of fodder for sequels.

title: Miss Hillary Schools a Scoundrel
author: Samantha Grace
description: A jaded lady and an accomplished rake aim for no strings attached... and miss. With heart and humor, Grace delivers a rich and winning debut that mixes meddling mothers, oppressive high society, subtle wit, steamy interludes, and a bit of intrigue.

title: Enraptured
author: Elisabeth Naughton
description: Filled with sizzling romance, heartbreaking drama, and a cast of multifaceted characters, this powerful and unusual retelling of the Orpheus and Eurydice story is Naughton’s best book yet.

title: Lady Maggie’s Secret Scandal
author: Grace Burrowes
description: The illegitimate daughter of a duke endeavors to protect her family from her mother’s schemes in Burrowes’s outstanding fifth Regency.

title: Lessons After Dark
author: Isabel Cooper
description: Cooper follows the knockout No Proper Lady with another supernatural Victorian, this one featuring a paranormally talented healer and a psychic teacher at a school for those with unusual talents.

title: The Rogue Pirate’s Bride
author: Shana Galen
description: In this delightful and action-packed historical, a swashbuckling privateer seduces an admiral’s daughter after she tries to kill him in retaliation for his sinking of her fiancé’s ship.

title: No Longer a Gentleman
author: Mary Jo Putney
description: Romance and wartime espionage mix delightfully in the fourth Lost Lords Regency (after Nowhere Near Respectable) from bestseller Putney.

title: Heart of Danger
author: Lisa Marie Rice
description: Rice begins a steamy series starring black ops agents and the women who love them.

title: Immortally Yours
author: Angie Fox
description: Fox opens a series about ancient gods, modern love, and one star-crossed couple who could use some divine intervention.

title: Shadow Woman
author: Linda Howard
description: In Howard's latest romantic thriller, a spirited woman and a sexily rugged man form an uneasy alliance.

title: Forbidden
author: Jacquelyn Frank
description: Frank spins a new paranormal series off her popular Nightwalkers books, introducing the Bodywalkers, an ancient race who battle evil.

title: Running Wild
author: Linda Howard and Linda Jones
description: Romantic suspense author Howard and paranormal romance author Jones team up to write a steamy contemporary western.

title: An Affair to Dismember
author: Elise Sax
description: Sax's series debut introduces a matchmaker-in-training who stumbles into a dangerous quagmire of murder and red-hot romance.

title: What an Earl Wants
author: Kasey Michaels
description: Michaels introduces a Regency series featuring four siblings whose family history includes a great deal of scandal and seduction.

title: Close Enough to Touch
author: Victoria Dahl
description: Dahl begins a series set in Wyoming by pairing up an L.A. makeup artist and a cowboy with his own Hollywood history.

title: Run the Risk
author: Lori Foster
description: Foster's new romantic suspense series starts with an undercover cop getting unexpectedly close to a reluctant witness.

title: Hidden Paradise
author: Janet Mullany
description: Known for sexy stories centering on Jane Austen and her works (Bespelling Jane Austen, etc.), Mullany sends a Jane Austen scholar to an English resort that mimics Georgian-era entertaining, with plenty of erotic adventures behind the scenes.

author: Harmony Evans

title: Taste for Temptation
author: Phyllis Bourne
description: A woman who thinks the right diet will bring her happiness falls inconveniently hard for her neighbor, a struggling pastry chef with a fondness for curvy ladies.

title: Nauti Temptress
author: Lora Leigh
description: Leigh's bestselling Nauti Boys series naturally leads to Nauti Girls, beginning with this matchup of two survivors looking for peace who are instead plunged into danger.

title: Burning Up
author: Anne Marsh
description: Danger and sensuality light up this sexy contemporary romance as a daring smoke jumper fights to save the woman he loves from a deadly arsonist.

title: Lord Gray's List
author: Maggie Robinson
description: This first novel in Robinson's Regency-era London List series mixes quirky characters, unexpected plot twists, humor, and romantic tension.

title: Taking the Reins
author: Kat Murray
description: A woman inherits a near-bankrupt stud ranch and hires a sexy horse trainer to help her turn it around in this series launch from Murray (who also writes as Jeanette Murray).

title: Wicked Nights with a Proper Lady
author: Tiffany Clare
description: Clare's new historical series reunites old flames after a scandal and lengthy separation. Naturally, they want to make up for lost time--but are reluctant to trust each other.

title: Secrets of a Wedding Night
author: Valerie Bowman
description: A widowed countess distributes a pamphlet warning of the horrors of one's wedding night, only to be seduced by her former fiancÃ©, who wants her to print a retraction.

title: Loving Lady Marcia
author: Kieran Kramer
description: In the House of Brady, three very lovely girls have hair of gold--but finding a match among the gentlemen of London is one comedy of errors that could bring down the house.

title: Wolfishly Yours
author: Lydia Dare
description: Paranormal romance author Dare's sixth novel of Regency-era werewolves pairs up one of the untamed Hadley brothers with a wild werewolf from Louisiana.

title: Deliver Me from Temptation
author: Tes Hilaire
description: In Hilaire's second Paladin Warriors paranormal, a duty-bound angelic warrior is bowled over by unexpected love.

title: Savage Hunger
author: Terry Spear
description: An army recruit meets her match in a were-jaguar she encounters in the Amazon rainforest.

title: How to Tame a Willful Wife
author: Christy English
description: English sets her retelling of The Taming of the Shrew in Regency-era England, pairing an earl and army veteran with his commanding officer's high-spirited daughter.

title: Waking Up with a Rake
author: Mia Marlowe and Connie Mason
description: Marlowe and Mason's third collaboration (after Lord of Fire and Ice), the first in their Regency Rakes series, draws on English history for the stories of unscrupulous men sent to seduce women and keep them from marrying the Prince Regent's brothers.

title: Demon's Curse
author: Alexa Egan
description: Egan debuts with the first book in a dark and sexy historical paranormal series about shape-shifters in Regency-era England.

title: Badlands Bride
author: Adrianne Wood
description: Debut novelist Wood sets this steamy western in the Colorado badlands.

title: An English Bride in Scotland
author: Lynsay Sands
description: Sands, author of the Argeneau vampire series and countless historical romances, begins a historical series set in the highlands of Scotland. 175,000-copy announced first printing.

title: Sins of a Ruthless Rogue
author: Anna Randol
description: Amid the glittering palaces of Russia and the noble houses of London, a woman must call upon a dangerous man from her past.

title: Any Duchess Will Do
author: Tessa Dare
description: Dare continues her bestselling Spindle Cove historical series with a Pygmalion story in which a barmaid becomes a duchess. 150,000-copy announced first printing.

title: The Wild Ones
author: M. Leighton
description: The bestselling contemporary romance e-book, now from Berkley in both e-book and physical editions.

title: One Night with a Cowboy
author: Cat Johnson
description: A one-night stand between a professor and a cowboy turns into romance when they meet again at the university where she teaches English and he’s on the ROTC staff.

title: Bite Me, Your Grace
author: Brooklyn Ann
description: A bluestocking authoress falls hard for the Lord Vampire of London in this entertaining paranormal historical.

title: A Little Night Mischief
author: Emily Greenwood
description: Regency romance author Greenwood debuts with a playful series about young ladies who discover that a little mischief can be a good thing.

title: Once Again a Bride
author: Jane Ashford
description: A young widow is taken in by her abusive husband’s caring family, who help her come out of her shell and learn to love.

title: The Geek Girl and the Scandalous Earl
author: Gina Lamm
description: An avid gamer falls through an antique mirror into a lavish bedchamber 200 years in the past, and into the arms of an earl in need of rescuing from his foolish romantic entanglements.

title: Darius
author: Grace Burrowes
description: A penniless Regency-era nobleman sells his body to make ends meet until he’s hired to impregnate another nobleman’s wife and finds himself falling in love with her.

title: What the Duke Desires
author: Sabrina Jeffries
description: launches a historical series with a forbidden romance between a duke and the illegitimate daughter of a viscount.

title: Caged Warrior: Dragon Kings, Book One
author: Lindsey Piper
description: The first installment in this paranormal romance series features demonic gladiators, ruthless mafia villains, and a proud race on the brink of extinction.

title: One Heart to Win
author: Johanna Lindsey
description: Lindsey’s 50th novel reveals hidden identities, family secrets, and love that transcends a decades-long feud in the majestic ranchland of 1880s Montana Territory.

title: If I Were You
author: Lisa Renee Jones
description: In the steamy first installment in Jones’s Inside Out erotic romance trilogy, a woman reads a diary of sexual escapades and becomes obsessed with re-creating them.

title: The Lone Hunt
author: L.L. Raand
description: Werewolves and vampires battle in Raand’s continuation of her popular lesbian paranormal series.

title: Improvisation
author: Karis Walsh
description: High school geometry teacher Jan Carroll thinks she’s figured out the shape of her life and her future, until graphic artist and fiddle player Tina Nelson comes along and teaches her to improvise.

title: Copper Girl
author: Jennifer Allis Provost

title: The Vampire with the Dragon Tattoo
author: Kerrelyn Sparks
description: Nerdy girl meets sexy Scot in this Love at Stake novel. 300,000-copy announced first printing.

title: Destiny’s Surrender
author: Beverly Jenkins
description: The story of a man, his mistress, and the baby he knew nothing about.

title: Foreplay: The Ivy Chronicles
author: Sophie Jordan
description: A debut New Adult trilogy set in an Ivy League university’s underground kink club. 75,000-copy announced first printing.

title: Wild Child
author: Molly O’Keefe
description: A contemporary romance about second chances at life and love.

title: Twilight Hunter: Execution Underground, Book 1
author: Kait Ballenger
description: The Execution Underground is an elite group tasked with protecting humanity from the supernatural.

title: Let Me Hold You
author: Melanie Schuster
description: Alana Sharp Dumond has remodeled her life. All she needs is someone to hold.

title: The Counterfeit Mistress
author: Madeline Hunter
description: In this riveting historical romance, a darkly handsome nobleman is determined to unmask a delicate and mysterious young beauty.

title: Sinners Club
author: Kate Pearce
description: The Sinners Club is a private gentlemen’s club whose members have mysterious pasts and secret fantasies too hot to reveal.

title: The Mammoth Book of Best New Erotica 12
author: Maxim Jakubowski
description: An inventive, provocative, and sensual collection.

title: An Undying Oath
author: HK Savage
description: Justin returns from war, but instead of being hailed as heroes he and his men are being sought as test subjects. Samantha unwittingly holds the key to his freedom, but doesn’t know who to trust.

title: Dangerous Seduction
author: Zoë Archer
description: This action-packed, steamy Victorian romance pairs up a combat veteran and a woman fighting for miners’ rights.

title: Born in Chains
author: Caris Roane
description: launches a sexy series about hot, hunky vampire warriors.

title: The Devil Wears Kilts
author: Suzanne Enoch
description: In Enoch’s new Regency series, risk is its own reward.

title: Against the Ropes
author: Sarah Castille
description: Wealthy entrepreneur Max Huntington is tough, rough, and the owner of an elite mixed martial arts club. But one woman will bring him to his knees.

title: Storm Warrior
author: Dani Harper
description: Romantic and paranormal elements combine in this immensely satisfying series launch with just a hint of spice.

title: The Awakening: Book One of the Chronicles of the Nubian Underworld
author: Shakir Rashaan
description: is an erotically charged journey inside Atlanta’s African-American BDSM community.

title: Hold Me in Contempt
author: Wendy Williams
description: In this erotic interracial love story, a serious, hard-working lawyer falls passionately in love with a sexy, dangerous man. Announced first print: 30,000.

title: Turned
author: Virna DePaul
description: kicks off the Belladonna Agency series with plenty of suspenseful paranormal action in a world where vampires live among humans.

title: Do or Die
author: Suzanne Brockmann
description: Bestseller Brockmann’s Reluctant Heroes series opener delivers everything that romantic suspense fans will expect, with a well-developed cast of sensitive alpha men and strong, imperfect women.

title: Loving You, Baby
author: Melanie Schuster
description: When Adrienne Sharp’s surrogacy deal with a Hollywood power couple goes south, she heads home to South Carolina to deliver a child she never expected to keep.

title: Rule Breaker
author: Lora Leigh
description: is the first hardcover release in Leigh’s bestselling Breed series, about genetically engineered beings fighting for survival and searching for their perfect mates.

title: Burn for Me
author: Cynthia Eden
description: Eden launches a dark, sexy paranormal series featuring shapeshifters.

title: The Unexpected Duchess
author: Valerie Bowman
description: Bowman spins a new Regency-set trilogy off from her Secret Brides series with this sweet, sassy story.

title: Lick
author: Kylie Scott
description: is the first print edition of Scott’s bestselling new adult novel about a young woman who falls in love with a rock star.

title: Must Love Dukes
author: Elizabeth Michels
description: Michels’s first Regency-era Tricks of the Ton novel gleams with humor and romance, accurately depicting the difficulties faced by 19th-century aristocratic women.

title: Her Perfect Mate
author: Paige Tyler
description: is a contemporary series launch featuring thrilling military spec-ops teamwork with a paranormal edge.

title: The Seduction of Miss Amelia Bell
author: Paula Quinn
description: is the first book in Quinn’s sexy Scottish romance series about the next generation of the MacGregor clan. Announced first print: 50,000.

title: Strain
author: Amelia C. Gormley

title: Cowboy Heat: Western Romance for Women edited
author: Delilah Devlin
description: Devlin follows Cowboy Lust with a new anthology of rugged romantics, rough riders, and rope wranglers.

title: The Big Book of Submission: 69 Kinky Tales edited
author: Rachel Kramer Bussel
description: Veteran editor Bussel assembles stories exploring every aspect of erotic submission.

title: Burn for Me
author: Ilona Andrews
description: kicks off the new Hidden Legacy series. PI Nevada Baylor has just taken on the hardest case in her life, and she’s being relentlessly pursued by a devastatingly powerful billionaire known as “Mad Rogan.” 150,000-copy announced first printing.

author: Lori Foster
description: Cannon Colter rescued Yvette Sweeny from kidnappers, only to put an end to her romantic dreams. Now she’s older, smarter, determined to face whatever life throws her way—even the prospect of sharing a house and business with Cannon.

title: The Accidental Abduction
author: Darcie Wilde
description: is a hot Regency romance in which a headlong flight across London to stop an elopement leads to a hasty wedding between strangers.

title: Spice
author: Seressia Glass
description: Nadia Spiceland, a baker, works in the business of temptation. But one customer is interested in more than just her delectable sticky buns.

title: The Sexy Librarian’s Big Book of Erotica
author: Edited by Rose Caraway

title: Irresistible Force
author: D.D. Ayres
description: Shay Appleton, fleeing her abusive ex, adopts Bogart, a stray who turns out to be a K-9 police dog. His human partner, James Cannon, wants Bogart out of Shay’s house and back on the force, but how can he leave Shay in peril?

title: Mine To Take
author: Jackie Ashenden
description: Gabriel Woolf has sworn vengeance against his father—but then he meets his stepsister and sparks fly. Can romance and family entanglements outweigh the lust for revenge?

title: Break Out
author: Nina Croft
description: Vampire Ricardo Sanchez is 2,000 years old and lives for no one but himself—until he meets his match in the form of a gorgeous, mysterious woman.

title: My Highland Spy
author: Victoria Roberts
description: Lady Ravenna Walsingham is sent to the Highlands to uncover a plot against the king. Playing the part of a governess, she infiltrates the home of Laird Ruairi Sutherland. But Ravenna soon discovers that the only threat Sutherland poses is to her heart.

title: The Truth About Leo
author: Katie Mac­Alister
description: In MacAlister’s first new Regency romance in 10 years, an impoverished Danish princess marries a half-conscious Englishman. Hilarity naturally ensues.

title: Try Me On for Size
author: Stephanie Haefner
description: is a sexy, laugh-out-loud love story about a woman trying to save her failing lingerie business with a new product: sex toys modeled on a handsome man. When she falls for the first model she meets, can she prove she’s his perfect fit?

title: Illusion
author: J.S. Cooper
description: Indie sensation Cooper introduces the Swept Away series with this dark and sexy romance about a woman marooned on a desert island with a mysterious stranger.

title: Slow Hand
author: Victoria Vane
description: Wade Knowlton is a workaholic close to leaving his struggling Montana law firm in the dust. Nicole is a Southern belle with a hankering for cowboys. Will they discover that love can lead to greener pastures?

title: The Rake’s Handbook, Including Field Guide
author: Sally Orr
description: Scandal surrounds Ross Thornbury, the infamous author of The Rake’s Handbook, a gentleman’s guide to society brides. To clear the air, Ross decides to get married. When Elinor Colton, the widow next door, refuses his proposal, Ross tries seductive words from his handbook to change her mind.

title: The Sexy Librarian’s Big Book of Erotica, edited
author: Rose Caraway
description: This voracious volume is simply bursting at the binding with amorous archives and bibliophilic bliss.

title: Men of the Manor: Erotic Encounters Between Upstairs Lords and Downstairs Lads, edited
author: Rob Rosen
description: gathers the hottest stories of romance and sex between wealthy aristocrats and hard-working estate staff, all with a pre-WWI backdrop.

author: Janine Ashbless
description: In a remote part of Europe, a priest keeps a dark secret beneath his chapel: an imprisoned angel. The priest’s daughter is determined to free him even though she risks her family, her life, and her soul.

title: Three of Hearts: Erotic Romance for Women, edited
author: Kristina Wright
description: Three’s company? No, three’s a charm! In these sexy stories, threesomes are not just falling into bed—they’re falling in love.

title: Hungry for More: Romantic Fantasies for Women, edited
author: Rachel Kramer Bussel
description: Love and sexual fantasy have always been intimately intertwined, and this collection of steamy stories shows just how well they can come together.

title: Cursed by Fire: The Immortal Brothers
author: Jacquelyn Frank
description: In Frank’s new paranormal romance series, a man who seeks immortality is cursed with eternal torment, until the goddess of conflict sends him on a mission and he meets the woman of his dreams.

title: An Island Affair
author: Monica Richardson
description: Jasmine Talbot is determined to transform her family’s magnificent Caribbean property into a one-of-a-kind B-and-B. But she needs the help of Jackson Conner, a proud, hunky contractor with a murky past.

title: Beautiful Surrender
author: Sherelle Green
description: Mya Winters has overcome a tough childhood in foster care to create a wonderful life. Organizing the first annual Elite Events Charity Date Auction is a way to give back to her community. There’s one hitch—her sexy cohost, private investigator Malik Madden.

title: One Night
author: Eric Jerome Dickey
description: shows a couple in closeup for 12 hours of passion and drama, with intense eroticism heightened by lyrical prose.

title: When Joss Met Matt
author: Ellie Cahill
description: Cahill’s debut novel is a charming friends-with-benefits story with a twist. Two college friends fall in and out of love with the wrong people while trying figure out who they are and what they really want. 15,000-copy announced first printing.

title: Playing Dirty: Monkey Business Trio, Book 1
author: C.L. Parker
description: Parker’s erotic romance explores the rivalry between two sports agents in the boardroom, the bedroom, the supply closet, the elevator, and anywhere else they’re given the opportunity.

title: The Last True Vampire
author: Kate Baxter
description: Michael Aristov is the last true king of the vampires. Pained by his failure to protect his race, he seeks solace in the dark nightclubs of L.A., only to fall for a human woman who might just be the mate he needs.

title: The Devil Wears Spurs
author: Soraya Lane
description: Playboy cowboy Ryder likes to party hard and often makes bad decisions, including gambling away his third of the family ranch. Chloe bailed her dad out of a bad debt, losing all her savings in the process. When she finds Ryder in trouble, she offers to win his ranch back, if he pays her college fees and promises to walk away from gambling, for good.

title: A Good Rake Is Hard to Find
author: Manda Collins
description: When Leonora Craven hears her brother James has been killed during a race with the ill-reputed Lords of Anarchy, she goes looking for answers. Instead she finds Lord Frederick Lisle, James’s oldest friend, and the man who broke her heart.

title: Dragon Fall
author: Katie MacAlister
description: MacAlister joins the Forever list with a paranormal romance that spins off her popular Light Dragons series. 50,000-copy announced first printing.

title: Opening Up
author: Lauren Dane
description: Bestseller Dane launches the Ink & Chrome contemporary erotic romance series, in which two top-notch motorcycle customizers get very hands-on with each other. 40,000-copy announced first printing.

title: The Lady Vanishes
author: Nicole Camden
description: Billionaire tech genius and inventor Milton Shaw studied Houdini and has perfected the art of sleight of hand. Stern doctor Regina Gallows hates trickery and needs to feel in control. Yet when she meets Milton, she finds her body warring with her idealism.

title: Married to a Perfect Stranger
author: Jane Ashford
description: Quiet and obliging, Mary Fleming and John Bexley marry to please their families. John immediately leaves on a two-year diplomatic mission. When he comes back, they realize everything they thought they knew about each other was wrong—and they must somehow figure out how to keep their marriage alive.

author: Jade Lee

Their plan unfolds perfectly until Trevor finds himself feeling jealous and possessive of his “fiancée.”

title: The Unleashing
author: Shelly Laurenston
description: With her trademark outrageous humor, Laurenston introduces a paranormal romance series featuring a band of tough-as-nails female fighters and the men who aren’t afraid to stand up to them.

title: Misfits
author: Garrett Leigh

title: Come Again: Sex Toy Erotica, edited
author: Rachel Kramer Bussel
description: In the latest collection from award-winning editor Bussel, sex toys bring couples, singles, and strangers to new heights of pleasure.

title: Flings: Sexy One-Night-Only Encounters, edited
author: Violet Blue
description: collects the most delightful, the dirtiest, and the wildest one-night-stand fantasies. Always surprising, often romantic, these stories of flings will inspire readers to spin their own tales of love, lust, and fantasy.

title: Tryst: A Sexual Education Novel
author: S.L. Jennings
description: From the bestselling author of Taint comes this steamy novel of a happy couple who decide to open their marriage to add spice to their sex life—and end up in a situation that neither expected. 25,000-copy announced first printing.

title: One Scandalous Kiss: An Accidental Heirs Novel
author: Christy Carlyle
description: Christy Carlyle’s debut Victorian historical romance delights in the first book of her Accidental Heirs series, in which a suffragist bookshop owner agrees to a devil’s bargain that results in one scandalous kiss.

title: Blood Kiss: Black Dagger Legacy
author: J.R. Ward
description: The legacy of the Black Dagger Brotherhood continues in a spinoff series about new recruits ready to train with the renowned warriors. 250,000-copy announced first printing.

title: Everything I Left Unsaid
author: M. O’Keefe
description: opens a gritty and sexy contemporary romance duology in which a phone call from a mysterious stranger is picked up by the wrong woman and ignites a dangerous game of seduction. 25,000-copy announced first printing.

title: Rock Me Two Times
author: Dawn Ryder
description: Kate’s small custom leather shop is about to get a big boost with a partnership with the ultra hot rock band Toxsin. But she is definitely not prepared to enter into this elite, celebrity world, especially when Syon Braden, leader of Toxsin, starts making moves.

title: Viking Warrior Rising
author: Asa Maria Bradley
description: A sexy immortal Viking warrior and a kick-ass heroine collide in this smoking-hot paranormal romance.

title: The Duke’s First Son
author: Jane Ashford
description: With the newfound freedom of marriage, a refined duke and a chaste duchess can finally explore pleasures of the flesh in this tender Regency romance.

title: Cam Girl
author: Leah Raeder
description: Everything Vada loved is gone. She’s got nothing left to lose. So when she meets a smooth-talking lothario who offers to set her up as a cam girl, she can’t say no. It’s all just kinky fun until a client gets serious.

title: Denial
author: Lisa Renee Jones
description: This sultry tale of possession, ecstasy, wild fantasies, and dangerous secrets is the first in the racy and suspenseful Careless Whispers series.

title: Dirty Heat
author: Cairo
description: one-night stands, weekend flings, lustful online affairs—Cairo serves up six naughty tales of deceit in the sheets. In the scandalous world of infidelity, there is no end to sexual imagination and forbidden lust.

title: Games Women Play
author: Zaire Crown
description: At 37, Tuesday is eager for a better way of life. Her all-female “business” team has made a fortune using a gentlemen’s club to attract, seduce—and rob—wealthy men. But circumstances force her to choose between the love she’s always wanted, the team she swore loyalty to, and the money she desperately needs to save her own life.

title: The Beebo Brinker Omnibus: Ann Bannon’s Pulp Classics by Ann Bannon, foreword
author: Lily Tomlin
description: The “queen of lesbian pulp fiction” defined lesbian fiction for the pre-Stonewall generation. The Beebo Brinker Chronicles, Vol. 1, includes the novels Odd Girl Out, I Am a Woman, and Women in the Shadows.

title: Sweet Little Lies
author: Jill Shalvis
description: Bestselling author Shalvis launches a fun, sexy contemporary series featuring a boy, a girl, and a wily wishing well. 300,000-copy announced first printing.

title: Under the Surface
author: Anne Calhoun
description: Det. Matt Dorchester keeps his emotions on a tight leash. But when he goes undercover to protect Eve Webber, a bar owner turned informant with a hit out on her, things spiral dangerously close to the edge of no return.

title: Deceived
author: Kate SeRine
description: In this contemporary political thriller, Luke Rogan’s assignment is simple: bring young Elijah Scoffield and his mother to safety. Sarah Scoffield will do anything to protect her son—even if that means teaming up with a deadly stranger. But Sarah soon finds herself falling in love with her dark hero.

title: Missed Connections
author: Tamara Mataya
description: After a one-night stand with sexy Jack ends in disappointment, Sarah begins an online-only relationship with the anonymous writer of a Missed Connection all about her. Soon she’s juggling a physical relationship with Jack and an emotional relationship with her Missed Connection, but there’s only so much of her to go around.

title: Billionaire in Wolf’s Clothing
author: Terry Spear
description: launches a new wolf shape-shifter romance series. Real estate mogul Rafe Denali, is devoting his funds to top-secret research on shifter life spans. Jade Ashton’s child’s life is on the line, and she’s on a mission to uncover Rafe’s secrets. What she finds instead is a wolf who enthralls her like no other.

title: Dirty for Me
author: Jackie Ashenden
description: Ezekiel Chase was born into a rich crime family; now he’s a mechanic and underground fighter. Tamara Eliot is a hard-working corporate high-flyer who appreciates the finer things in life. Their connection is deep, dark, and explosive.

title: Finding Their Balance
author: M.Q. Barber
description: Between Alice’s headstrong insistence on pushing her sexual limits and Jay’s need to confront an

title: Loving Lies
author: Tina Donahue
description: Isabella is kidnapped as part of her uncle’s attempt to control her family’s fortune. When she is rescued, Isabella can’t imagine why a stranger would risk his life for her—until she discovers her rescuer believes she’s his betrothed.

title: Cowboy Resurrection
author: Mia Hopkins
description: Marketing hotshot Monica Kaur has three months to plan and promote a rodeo. She enlists bullfighter Dean MacKinnon. He’s thrilled to begin a no-strings-attached affair with brainy, sexy Monica, but her close-knit Sikh-American family would sooner run him out of town than see her with a notorious rodeo romeo.

title: The One That Got Away, edited
author: Kristina Wright
description: There is something hopelessly romantic about the idea of connecting with a long-lost love. This luscious collection of second-chance stories celebrates longing and long-delayed fulfillment.

title: Do You Want to Start a Scandal
author: Tessa Dare
description: New York Times bestseller Dare makes her long-awaited return to Spindle Cove with a new novel combining her two bestselling series. 150,000-copy announced first printing.

title: Honor: The Breaking Point
author: Jay Crownover
description: introduces Crownover’s most complicated hero yet, in the first book in a romantic suspense series. 50,000-copy announced first printing.

title: Body and Soul
author: Jade Williams
description: With a bad breakup behind her and a milestone birthday ahead of her, love has become a four-letter word to music magazine director Carol Shaw. When she becomes a judge on a top reality TV talent search, she’s surrounded by competing hotties—and her sexy, tempting ex is one of her fellow judges.

title: Addicted to You
author: Renita Pizzitola
description: is the sweet and sizzling story of two friends who each want more—and the love triangle that’s holding them back.

title: Hard to Hold: A Hard to Play Novel
author: Katie Rose
description: introduces a team of New Jersey soccer stars who score on and off the pitch.

title: Furious Rush
author: S.C. Stephens
description: Mackenzie Cox has a lot to prove. Daughter of a racing legend, she is eager to show the world that she has inherited her father’s talent in the male-dominated sport of professional motorcycle racing. The last thing Kenzie needs is to be antagonized by her rival team’s newest rider, Hayden Hayes—or to fall for him. 50,000-copy announced first printing.

title: Perfect Pleasures
author: Deborah Fletcher Mello
description: World famous MMA champion Zachary Barrett has returned to his home in Phuket, Thailand. Thanks to his twin brother, a renowned pro trainer in Colorado, Zachary is primed and ready for his next title bout—but his toughest match may be with the sports journalist assigned to write an exposé on him.

title: Lord of the Runes
author: Sabrina Jarema
description: As outsiders threaten Viking Eirik Ivarson’s homeland and all he holds dear, he vows to maintain his focus and avenge the jarl’s death. Asa Sigrundsdottir, a spirited shieldmaiden, is wary of the golden-haired warrior discovered half-frozen in a storm. Despite the shadows in her past, he chooses her to help him on his journey, but soon their bond is tested.

title: McKellan’s Run
author: Nicole Hurley-Moore
description: Fate has brought Violet and her daughter, Holly, back to the house Violet grew up in. As soon as Violet runs into James “Mac” McKellan, she wonders if she should run all the way back to the city. Can she trust him, can she trust herself, or will she be burned again?

title: Blackthorne’s Bride: A Bitter Creek Novel
author: Joan Johnston
description: A rogue nobleman, a rescued lady, and revenge undone by romance all play a part in this American west historical novel of passion and deception.

title: The Chosen: A Novel of the Black Dagger Brotherhood
author: J.R. Ward
description: continues Ward’s bestselling series with a dramatic tale of a troubled vampire warrior and the woman who holds his secrets.

title: Love Story
author: Lauren Layne
description: Over the course of a cross-country road trip, feuding childhood sweethearts get a second chance at love.

title: The Billionaires: 100 Shades of Sin
author: Calista Fox
description: In Fox’s smoldering ménage romance, three childhood best friends reunite as adults and realize they don’t have to make impossible choices—they can just say yes.

title: How to Tame a Beast in Seven Days
author: Kerrelyn Sparks
description: This fantasy romance series launch from bestseller Sparks opens on the Isle of Moon, where Luciana has grown up hidden away because of her magical powers. Her life is upended when she enters an arranged marriage with a man who can harness lightning.

title: 72 Hours
author: Bella Jewel
description: Digital bestseller Jewel debuts in print with a romantic thriller about two desperate people trying to escape a murderer’s horrifying scheme.

title: The Deep End
author: Kristen Ashley
description: At the elite Honey club, powerful men give in to their desire to submit to dominant women. Ashley’s series launch follows one such pair as their kink connection develops into romance.

title: Dangerous Consequences
author: Lisa Renee Johnson
description: A psychologist and a neurosurgeon must defend their marriage against a dangerous stalker who wants to destroy it, in Johnson’s debut, a contemporary romantic thriller.

title: Love Runs Deep
author: Gail Chianese
description: Active duty is no time for romance, but when two naval officers find themselves in close quarters on a submarine, the temptation to fraternize is hard to resist.

title: Crossing Hearts
author: Rebecca Crowley
description: Chilean soccer legend Rio Vidal is driven to define a role on his new team in Atlanta, Ga. But he must also adapt to a new culture—and for that he needs the help of his translator, Eva Torres.

title: The Duchess Deal
author: Tessa Dare
description: A duke who’s a traumatized war veteran recklessly marries a commoner, thinking she’ll be easily cowed—but she has plans that go far beyond producing his heir. 150,000-copy announced first printing.

title: Wilde in Love
author: Eloisa James
description: launches a Georgian-era series. A duke’s adventurous son with a dramatic public life falls for a bookish woman who craves privacy. 400,000-copy announced first printing.

title: A Daring Arrangement
author: Joanna Shupe
description: Set in New York City’s Gilded Age, Shupe’s first book for Avon introduces an English beauty with a scheme to win the man she loves, and the American scoundrel who ruins her plans. 100,000-copy announced first printing.

title: Duke of Desire
author: Elizabeth Hoyt
description: Hoyt concludes her long-running Maiden Lane Regency romance series with a suspenseful novel that puts two passionate lovers in danger. 175,000-copy announced first printing.

title: Caught by the Scot
author: Karen Hawkins
description: A dashing Scottish privateer looks for a wife who won’t mind his many mistresses, but the woman he wants to marry refuses to be an afterthought.

title: Highland Dragon Warrior
author: Isabel Cooper
description: begins a prequel series, set in 1305 Scotland and featuring dragon shape-shifters, that explains the origins of Cooper’s Highland Dragons.

title: Best Women’s Erotica of the Year, Volume 3, edited
author: Rachel Kramer Bussel
description: , contains daring, bold, and surprising tales of women who pursue their passions anywhere and everywhere.

title: The Bride Takes a Groom: The Penhallow Dynasty, Book 2
author: Lisa Berne
description: Katherine Brooke is a fabulously wealthy heiress, but she’s a pawn in her parents’ ruthless plan to marry her into the nobility. Capt. Hugo Penhallow—charming, handsome, and from a noble but impoverished family—comes into her life once more, and she sees a chance to be free.

title: How to Forget a Duke
author: Vivienne Lorret
description: The duke of Rydstrom needs a wife, preferably one with a large fortune and a complete lack of curiosity. Jacinda is a professional matchmaker who’s sure the duke is hiding something. When amnesia strikes her, she forgets all the reasons she shouldn’t fall in love wih her client.

title: Guardian’s Bond: Ancient Ink, Book 1
author: Rhenna Morgan
description: Priest Rahandras has lived for years with the darkness trapped inside him. Betrayed by his own brother and forced to watch his clan’s brutal annihilation, the only thing Priest wants more than to escape the curse that haunts him is to rebuild. Kateri Falsen is a woman of logic and facts. Priest knows they’re fated mates, but he’ll also have to show her his love, and protect Kateri from the evil trapped inside him.

title: Squared Away
author: Annabeth Albert
description: In the wake of tragedy, SEAL Mark Whitley has returned stateside to act as guardian to his sister’s three young children. But complications arise when he learns a conflicting will gives custody to their cousin Isaiah James, a former wild party boy. As the legal details are sorted out, the cousins move in together to temporarily share custody, and their long-buried attraction quickly resurfaces.

title: Blind Trust
author: Lynda Aicher
description: Lawyer Ryan Burns pursues his career ambitions by networking with executives who share his taste for BDSM. At the club called the Boardroom, he gets to pleasure women while maintaining emotional distance. Then he meets Brie Westfall, who’s ready to break out of her conservative life and try something exciting and new.

title: Hard Wood: Ash Brothers, Book 1
author: Jenika Snow
description: Noah Ash’s wife died on their honeymoon, and for the decade since, he’s been celibate and focused on working at the lumber company he owns with his brothers. When Mia Stone moves to Rockbridge, Colo., to start a new life and a new profession, she’s surprised to fall for the big, burly lumberjack.

title: Touched by You: Wellspring, Book 1
author: Elle Wright
description: Brooklyn Wells fights her dominating father, CEO Parker Wells, at every step. Instead of taking her appointed place in the boardroom, she’s a social worker in Wellspring, Mich. Instead of living for diamonds and designer gowns, she helps her community’s poor and lost. And instead of entering into an arranged marriage, she’s falling hard for the troubled newcomer who saved her life.

title: Wait for Me, Jack
author: Addison Jones
description: Set near San Francisco, this novel follows the fortunes and failures of Jack and Milly over 60 years. They marry in 1952 and cling to each other through the years despite having little in common. The social changes they live through affect their relationship in complex and surprising ways. What holds them together is stronger than what pulls them apart.

title: Beautiful Sinner: A Devil’s Rock Novel
author: Sophie Jordan
description: Cruz was wrongly accused of a high-profile crime and imprisoned. Gabriella’s desperate for the scoop on the story, which will get her career off the ground and get her out of their tiny hometown. But during an intimate interview, sparks fly.

title: The Governess Game: Girl Meets Duke
author: Tessa Dare
description: Alexandra Mountbatten takes on an impossible post: transforming two wild orphans into proper young ladies. Their debauched guardian, Chase Reynaud, refuses to settle down. For the sake of the girls, who need a stable home, Alexandra challenges Chase—and loses her heart.

title: Wilde for You
author: Eloisa James
description: is James’s fourth Wildes of Lindow Castle romance, continuing the saga of Regency London’s most eligible bachelors.

title: Shades of Wicked: A Night Rebel Novel
author: Jeaniene Frost
description: opens a series spun off from the Night Huntress books. Sexy and ruthless vampire Ian is in trouble: a demon has claimed his soul. Veritas, a Law Guardian, decides to use Ian as bait to trap the demon, but doesn’t count on falling in love.

title: Shadow and Ice
author: Gena Showalter
description: launches the Gods of War epic saga. A group of otherworldly immortals have finally broken free of their prison. In a bid to rule the Earth, their fight to the death resumes. But this time, these savage warriors will also risk their hearts.

title: The Highlander Who Protected Me
author: Vanessa Kelly
description: Lady Ainsley Matthews was expected to make a magnificent match. Instead, she’s hiding on a remote Scottish estate, terrified that her vicious former fiancé will use her pregnancy to force her into marriage. One man can help her: Royal Kendrick, son of a distinguished Highland clan.

title: London’s Wicked Affair
author: Anabelle Bryant
description: Lunden Beckford, Duke of Scarsdale, has chosen to exile himself far from London’s painful memories and cruel gossip. Forced back to town on business, he falls in with his friend’s sister, beautiful, willful Amelia Strathmore, and offers to show her some of life’s pleasures.

title: Stripped
author: Zoey Castile
description: Robyn Flores and Zac Fallon meet over a laundry mix-up. The next time Zac sees Robyn, he’s performing as a stripper at her best friend’s bachelorette party. So much for wooing the pretty schoolteacher with an old-fashioned family—unless he pulls out all the stops.

title: Legends of Lust: Erotic Myths from Around the World
author: Autumn Bardot
description: reveals the fiery passions lying dormant behind 14 world myths. Odysseus teases lustful goddess Calypso, Vishvamitra and Menaka find bodily nirvana, and Gilgamesh sends temple prostitute Shamhat to tame a wild man who gives as good as he gets.

title: Music City Dreamers
author: Robyn Nyx
description: Louie Francis arrives in Nashville hoping to be a songwriter. Heather King has an eye for discovering new talent, but her record label boss takes credit for all her hard work. When Heather and Louie are thrust together to work with country royalty, their attraction threatens to undermine their careers.

title: Escape to Pleasure: Lesbian Travel Erotica, edited
author: Sandy Lowe and Victoria Villasenor
description: Award-winning authors explore the sexy side of vacation travel in these sensual tales of lesbian erotica.

title: Escape to Pleasure: Lesbian Travel Erotica
author: Edited by Sandy Lowe and Victoria Villasenor
description: Midwinter is the perfect time to launch this anthology of sunny stories about lesbian love and passion on vacation.

title: Rebel
author: Beverly Jenkins
description: A new series from historical romance author Jenkins is always an event. This launch title follows a Northern woman to post–Civil War New Orleans, where she finds a career and unexpected love.

title: The Earl Next Door
author: Amelia Grey
description: Opening a series about spirited young Regency-era widows, this novel introduces a lord looking for a wife and the liberated widow who only wants to be his lover.

title: It’s Getting Scot in Here
author: Suzanne Enoch
description: London socialite Amelia-Rose Baxter requires a husband who accepts her for herself. She finds him in Highlander Niall MacTaggert, which is awkward, as she’s supposed to marry Niall’s older brother.

title: Whiteout
author: Adriana Anders
description: A baffling attack on an Antarctic research station leaves only two people alive—with no power, no radio, and a killer tracking their every move.

title: Erotic Teasers, edited
author: Rachel Kramer Bussel
description: , collects short sexy stories with a variety of settings that all contain an element of delayed gratification—and climaxes that are worth waiting for.

title: Misadventures of a Curvy Girl
author: Sierra Simone
description: Happily curvy Ireland Mills is stranded by a storm and ends up in the arms of Caleb Carpenter and Ben Weber, two men she’s enlisted to be the public faces of their small Kansas town. And it turns out they’re very happy to enlist her to be their lover.

title: The Wallflower Wager: Girl Meets Duke
author: Tessa Dare
description: Loyal and passionate, Lady Penelope Campion never met a lost or wounded creature she wouldn’t take into her home and her heart—including wealthy and ruthless Gabriel Duke, who’s clawed his way from the lowliest slums to the pinnacle of high society.

title: Immortal Born: An Argeneau Novel
author: Lynsay Sands
description: Allie Chambers is struggling to care for an orphaned vampire baby. When her attempts to steal from a blood bank go awry, Allie wakes up surrounded by doctors, cops, and Magnus, her destined life mate.

title: Blood Truth
author: J.R. Ward
description: , the fourth Black Dagger Legacy paranormal, pairs up a soldier with the Black Dagger Brotherhood and a woman trying to find the serial killer who murdered her sister. 150,000-copy announced first printing.

title: The Laird’s Vow
author: Heather Grothaus
description: In this trilogy opener set in medieval Scotland, a merchant claiming to be the bastard son of a baron arrives to claim his crumbling castle, to the consternation of the lady living in it.

title: Wild Rain
author: Beverly Jenkins
description: A reporter for a black newspaper falls for a raucous female rancher in post–Civil War Wyoming in the second romance of Jenkins’s Women Who Dare series.

title: The Rakess: Society of Sirens, Vol. 1,
author: Scarlett Peckham
description: opens Peckham’s regency-era Society of Sirens series, about three ladies determined to weaponize their scandalous reputations to fight for justice, with this tale of a no-strings-attached fling between a radical libertine lady and a Scottish architect that gives way to real feeling.

title: A Cowboy to Remember
author: Rebekah Weatherspoon
description: A fall lands chef Evie Buchanan in the hospital with no memory of who she is. The only person she remembers is her childhood friend, former rodeo champion Zach Pleasant. Their relationship ended badly years before, but maybe Evie’s amnesia will offer them a chance to start fresh.

title: 52 Fridays
author: KamalaDevi McClure and Roxanne DePalma
description: In this erotic romance, Raven discovers that her girlfriend enjoys being sexually submissive, leading both women to explore their kinkier sides.

title: The Last Days of Autumn
author: Donna K. Ford
description: Autumn Landers, recently diagnosed with cancer, falls in love with her live-in caregiver, Caroline Cross, despite the small amount of time she has left to live.

title: Rebel Wears Plaid
author: Eliza Knight
description: This series launch introduces Lady Jenny Mackintosh, willing to risk her life to help the Jacobite rebellion, and warrior Toran Fraser, hell-bent on taking down the Jacobites responsible for his mother’s death. When their paths cross, Toran falls for Jenny, not realizing she’s his enemy.

title: Beauty Tempts the Beast: A Sins for All Seasons Novel
author: Lorraine Heath
description: In the finale to the series, the newly penniless Althea Stanwick turns to Benedict Trewlove, nicknamed Beast, for lessons in seduction.

title: All Scot and Bothered
author: Kerrigan Byrne
description: Byrne’s second Devil You Know romance sees Lord Chief Justice Cassius Ramsey setting out to investigate London’s most notorious gaming hall, unaware that the owner is Cecilia Teague, the alluring woman he hopes to court.

title: Won’t Go Home Without You
author: Cheris Hodges
description: A man tries to save his failing marriage in Hodges’s second Richardson Sisters romance, set against the backdrop of the family’s historic South Carolina bed and breakfast.

title: Big Bad Wolf
author: Suleikha Snyder
description: New York City serves as a sanctuary for supernatural creatures in Snyder’s first Third Shift paranormal romance. After vigilante Joe Peluso takes down six members of a clan of criminal bear-shifters, lawyer Neha Ahluwalia comes to his defense—putting targets on both their backs.

title: The Duke’s Princess Bride
author: Amalie Howard
description: After Princess Sarani Rao’s father, an Indian maharaja, is murdered, Sarani must flee aboard the ship of the man she used to love to avoid meeting the same fate. Will reuniting with British Capt. Rhystan Huntley reignite their old flame?.

title: The Stormbringer
author: Isabel Cooper
description: introduces a world full of monsters, in this fantasy romance about a man newly awakened from a mystical sleep who teams up with a fierce female warrior to save the world from the Traitor God.

title: The Duke Goes Down
author: Sophie Jordan
description: launches the Duke Hunt series with this Regency-set enemies-to-lovers romance between a duke’s son, born out of wedlock, and avicar’s daughter who’ve hated each other since childhood.

title: Heartless
author: Gena Showalter
description: A pro gamer receives a heart transplant that grants her mystical powers and leads her to a magical world ruled by a dangerous man who has a history with her heart’s previous owner. 600,000-copy announced first printing.

title: The Virgin Who Vindicated Lord Darlington
author: Anna Bradley
description: Celia Gilchrist goes undercover as a governess to investigate the murder of a Marquess’s wife, but ends up falling for her lead suspect in Bradley’s second Swooning Virgins Society romance.

title: The Duke Heist
author: Erica Ridley
description: A con artist accidentally falls for her latest mark while pulling off her most personal crime to date, in the first Regency of Ridley’s Wild Wynchesters series, starred by PW.

title: A Wolf in Duke’s Clothing
author: Susanna Allen
description: The kick-off of the Shape-Shifters of the Beau Monde paranormal Regency series sees a wolf-shifter duke searching for a mate during the London season.

title: A Reckless Match
author: Kate Bateman
description: Childhood nemeses must team up to save their rival families from ruination in the enemies-to-lovers romance that launches Bateman’s Ruthless Rivals Regency series.

title: Never Cross a Highlander
author: Lisa Rayne
description: takes on the highland romance genre with a tale of suspense, passion, and strapping Black Scotsmen.

title: The Long Game
author: Rachel Reid
description: Game Changers, Reid’s gay hockey romance series, makes its print debut in this sixth outing, about on-ice nemeses who have a secret relationship.

title: I Am Ayah—The Way Home
author: Donna Hill
description: Photographer Ayah Flemming, a descendant of one of the captives transported by the Amistad, finds love while confronting her family’s past in Hill’s intergenerational sophomore outing.

title: Up All Night with a Good Duke
author: Amy Rose Bennett
description: launches the Byronic Book Club series, about gothic romance aficionados in Regency England who stumble on love stories of their own.

title: Stuck with You
author: Fortune Whelan
description: A former NHL player and a nurse whose recent celebrity fling landed her in the tabloids come together while each renting half of a shared condo, in Whelan’s debut and Dorseys of Conception Bay series launch.

title: To Catch a Raven
author: Beverly Jenkins
description: The third Women Who Dare novel from romance legend Jenkins returns to the Reconstruction-era South, where a con woman is tasked by the U.S. government with retrieving the stolen Declaration of Independence—with help from a handsome special agent.

title: Some Dukes Have All the Luck
author: Christina Britton
description: Spinning off from Britton’s Isle of Synne Regency series, the Synneful Spinsters series opens with the opposites-attract romance between an awkward scientist and a rakish duke who come together in a marriage of convenience.

title: Even Cowbots Get the Blues: Queer, Smutty Stories
author: S. Park
description: offers an array of far-future m/m erotic shorts featuring cowboys, robots, and robot cowboys.

title: The Viper
author: J.R. Ward
description: Bestseller Ward’s third Black Dagger Brotherhood: Prison Camp paranormal romance follows an injured inmate, Kane, who falls for the woman who nurses him back to health and vows to secure her freedom at any cost.

title: Highland Beast
author: Heather McCollum
description: The second Sons of Sinclair romance finds a love match for another dashing Black Highland warrior. 100,000-copy announced first printing.

title: The Art of Scandal
author: Regina Black
description: centers on a dissatisfied 40-something trapped in a loveless marriage to a presidential hopeful who finds relief in the arms of a 26-year-old artist.

title: Any Duke in a Storm
author: Amalie Howard
description: When Victorian spy Lisbeth Medford's cover is blown mid-mission, she relies on annoyingly charming Raphael Saint to survive‚Äîeven though he may be part of the very smuggling ring she's investigating. 60,000-copy announced first printing.
